data.title: Official Athletics Website
data.meta_description: Evelyn Pickett (6) Defense - 2023: Named Patriot League Defensive Player of the Week (Feb. 27)...Logged multiple ground balls in four contests...Season-high ...
data.text:
2023: Named Patriot League Defensive Player of the Week (Feb. 27)...Logged multiple ground balls in four contests...Season-high three ground balls at No. 19 Jacksonville (Feb. 16).

2022: Appeared in 15 games for the Black Knights while making 14 starts...Mainstay on defense for Army en route to second seed in Patriot League Tournament...Logged 15 ground balls...Caused five turnovers...Picked up four ground balls versus No. 6 Loyola (Apr. 16).

2021: Appeared in eight games making seven starts as a sophomore ... Was a key contributor in the midfield for the Black Knights ... Picked up five ground balls and caused one turnover on the defensive side of the ball ... Snatched two ground balls and caused one turnover against Colgate (Apr. 4).

2020: Saw action in one game as a freshman … made her collegiate debut in a road win at Hartford (2/21) … recorded one ground ball against the Hawks.

At Oakton: Named the Concorde District Player of the Year, First Team All-State, First Team All-Region and First Team All-District as a senior … tabbed the Oakton High School Female Athlete of the Year in 2019 … earned Second Team All-Region and First Team All-District honors in 2018 … got the Second Team All-conference nod in 2017 … recipient of the Coach's Award as a senior … was a three-time team captain … four-year letterwinner on the swim and dive team … made the Virginia 6A All-State Team during multiple seasons … served as a team captain during her senior campaign … part of the 200 free relay squad that set the Virginia 6A North Region record … named an All-American in the 200 free relay in 2016 and 2019 … received Washington Post All-Met Honorable Mention as a senior … member of the National Honor Society … named an AP Scholar with Distinction … played club ball for the Cardinal Girls Lacrosse Club...Company B-3.
